item.title: Architecting C# Domain Models for Human and AI Collaboration
item.description: I went down a rabbit hole of extreme encapsulation in C# only to find a more pragmatic path. Discover the journey from a complex domain model to a simpler one that provides powerful guardrails for AI development tools like GitHub Copilot.

item.title: A Guide to Mastering GitHub Copilot on github.com
item.description: Unlock a new level of productivity by moving beyond the IDE and mastering GitHub Copilot directly on github.com. This guide covers the essential techniques for setting up, creating effective requests, parallelizing your work, and mastering the feedback loop.
